feed.title: Dittofeed Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dittofeed: v0.20.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • v0.19.0 versions by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1128
  • trigger broadcast api by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1129
  • scope file attachments by workspace id by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1132
  • improve bootstrap setup by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1133
  • keyed resources by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1134
  • assorted fixes by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1136
  • ensure wait-for conditions check initial values by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1137
  • sanitize workflow ids for new event triggered journey schema by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1138
  • load user properties in journey editor by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1139
  • keyed resources docs by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1141
  • ensure path defined on keyed user properties by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1142
  • fix delay hardcoded days by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1144
  • allow keyed performed user properties in leafs by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1146
  • update images in keyed guide by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1143
  • feat: Mailchimp by @neo773 in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1131
  • everyone segment by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1147
  • broadcast default sub group by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1148
  • document clickhouse tables by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1149
  • workspaces endpoints validations by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1150
  • annyof keyed fix by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1152
  • ensure public is copied to lite by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1153
  • preparation for embedded components by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1154
  • ensure key is persisted between drafts by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1155
  • additional validations and telemetry supporting messaging activity by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1156
  • make ses event fields nullable by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1157
  • email and sms provider settings endpoints by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1158
  • workspace tombstoned status by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1159
  • tombstone workspace cleanup by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1160
  • fix for download segments endpoint by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1161
  • add body to twilio webhook by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1162
  • make ses webhook types more lax by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1163
  • limit resiliency observables to active workspaces by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1164
  • update configValue from upsert sms and email providers by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1165
  • not exists segment operator trait by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1166
  • Use https github clone instead of SSH by @srrm99 in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1167
  • add more tracing by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1168
  • fix mailchimp error handing by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1169
  • allow disabling of deliveries links by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1170
  • option to disable user id in deliveries table by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1171
  • optional snippet column for deliveries table by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1172
  • fix path by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1175
  • allow email from names by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1174
  • humanize delivery status by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1173
  • allow searching deliveries by multiple user ids by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1176
  • update docs by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1177
  • filter out inactive workspaces from resiliency by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1178
  • last performed ui by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1179
  • add event file example by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1180
  • remove redundant operator in last performed editor by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1181
  • last performed bugfix by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1182
  • ensure definition updated at set with upsert segment by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1183
  • user property schema titles by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1184
  • sms journey overrides by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1185
  • deprecated message docker-compose.prod.yaml by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1186
  • resource limits docker compose by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1187
  • mailchimp attachments by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1188
  • allow parent workspaces to be created from admin-cli by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1189
  • add logging to attachments by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1190
  • fix regression in email attachments by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1191
  • use child workspace ids to find events for parent workspace by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1192
  • allow journeys to re-enter by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1193
  • extra validations around api endpoints by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1194
  • allow journey event keys to be numbers by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1195
  • add more tests, telemetry by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1196
  • re-entry ui by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1197
  • more fixes for numeric keys by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1199
  • add faq acronym to docs title page by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1200
  • pass through features to bootstrap on startup by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1201
  • feature update by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1202
  • combined compute properties workflow by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1203
  • allow workflows to run on dedicated workers by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1204
  • fix for re-entry check by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1198
  • cli utils by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1205
  • more worker options by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1206
  • support cc and bcc by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1207
  • get delivery body by additional fields by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1208
  • terminate compute properties workflow admin by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1209
  • include triggering message id deliveries by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1210
  • worker opts safety by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1211
  • fix parseInt in worker config by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1212
  • fix for get delivery body by message id by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1213
  • expose journey twilio overrides in ui by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1214
  • disable to links in deliveries table by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1216
  • complete twilio callback by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1215
  • cc and bcc ui by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1217
  • process rows counter by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1218
  • scope counter for process rows to workspace by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1219
  • fix deliveries table types by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1220
  • add local logging driver by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1221
  • new delivery body lookup, fix mailchimp cc's by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1222
  • implement a skip recompute step by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1223
  • process rows span by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1224
  • ensure user property assignments are cleared when definition changes by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1225

New Contributors

  • @srrm99 made their first contribution in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1167

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/compare/v0.19.0...v0.20.0
